title: Replay unreadable after download Help ?
body:
Hello Legends, 

I come out with a question about the replays of the Client.

I watch one of my replay, and reccord a part of it, the file goes in "highlight" file, its a .webm.
I tried to open it with VLC and I have an error message saying :
"Pas de décodeur approprié pour le format:
VLC ne supporte probablement pas le format audio ou vidéo « undf ». Malheureusement il n'y a rien à faire."

Which mean in english : "No decoder suitable for format:
VLC probably does not support the audio or video format "undf". Unfortunately there is nothing to do."

I also tried to change the format with Format Factory, it doesn't work, I tried with website webm to avi or mp4 but my file is too big finally, I tried to open it in Adobe Premiere but Adobe cannot importe the file...

Anyone of you could know about this issue ? Do I have option to be able to read it and watch my replay ?

Thank you very much for your help.

PS : sorry for my english, I'm from france, here to learn it ;)

With kind regards,

replies.body: Replays are still in testing so you may run into problems.  Unless the replay is from an older patch, I'm not sure why this would be happening.  I recommend reporting this over at the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards so the client devs can review it.  Thanks for the report!
